name: For Fox's Sake!
description:
For the ACM Winter Game Jam 2021, us diploma students worked together to create a cute game in which you are an arctic fox hunting for food in a modern ecosystem, damaged slowly by the human race.

As diploma students, this is our first game we have made from scratch in a group project, so excuse any bugs you may see.

Thank you for looking at our page and hope you have a lovely day!

Dev highscore - 792, see what you can do!
